comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Robert Lee Henry (May 12, 1864 – July 9, 1931) was a Democratic member of the United States House of Representatives from Texas from 1897 to 1917 (7th district: 1897–1903; 11th district: 1903–1917). Source: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Lee_Henry
